Author: dmmge
Text: This is totally normal. When I got told I would need to be admitted to rehab, I nearly burst out in tears of joy. My eating disorder felt very real for the first time, I was finally “sick enough” (spoiler alert: your ED will deny this straight to the deathbed).   It’s a weird feeling and I don’t really have much advice for how to handle it. Just know it’s a weird limbo that a lot of us go through and you’re not alone <3

Author: cottoncandymandy
Text: Oof, I think we all feel this way when called out. Ultimately I think it's good to be called out every once in a while. People notice more than they ever say or we think they don't notice...
